Interface Sprinkler

  • All Superinterfaces:

    public interface Sprinkler
extends GenericDevice

    • Field Detail

      • SPRINKLER_POWER_STATUS

        static final String SPRINKLER_POWER_STATUS
        Service property indicating whether the sprinkler is is turned on or off.
        • This property is mandatory
        • Type of values : java.lang.Boolean
        • Description : value is true when the sprinkler is turned on, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        getPowerStatus(), setPowerStatus(boolean), turnOn(), turnOff(), Constant Field Values

      • setPowerStatus

        boolean setPowerStatus(boolean state)
        Change the power status of this sprinkler.
        Parameters:
        state - the new power state of this sprinkler.
        Returns:
        the previous power state of this sprinkler.
        See Also:
        getPowerStatus(), SPRINKLER_POWER_STATUS
